messages.msgSnippet: Heya! Don t know how you feel about such things, but at the UnitedHollywood.com site, there s a lot of information about the ethics of many of the TV show
messages.messageBody:
Heya!

Don't know how you feel about such things, but at the
UnitedHollywood.com site, there's a lot of information about the
ethics of many of the TV show download mechanisms, the writers'
strike, and residuals.


On Feb 6, 2008 10:42 AM, Amanda Horein <horein@...> wrote:
> We are looking for a site to watch some of our favorite TV shows. We want it
> to be legal though so I thought I would ask you folks. Thanks in advance.

messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] TV Downloads
messages.msgSnippet: They may not have the shows you are looking for, but www.hulu.com is a beta site with free downloads until March.  After that I m not sure what the charge will
messages.messageBody:
They may not have the shows you are looking for, but www.hulu.com is a
beta site with free downloads until March. After that I'm not sure
what the charge will be, but I'm enjoying it right now!



>
> On Feb 6, 2008, at 1:42 PM, Amanda Horein wrote:
>
>> We are looking for a site to watch some of our favorite TV shows.
>> We want it
>> to be legal though so I thought I would ask you folks. Thanks in
>> advance.
>

messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] TV Downloads
messages.msgSnippet: ... Most of the networks have their newest shows available either for streaming or limited download. AOL has a site with a lot of shows: http://video.aol.com/
messages.messageBody:
On Feb 6, 2008, at 1:42 PM, Amanda Horein wrote:

> We are looking for a site to watch some of our favorite TV shows.
> We want it
> to be legal though so I thought I would ask you folks. Thanks in
> advance.

Most of the networks have their newest shows available either for
streaming or limited download.

AOL has a site with a lot of shows:

http://video.aol.com/

Click on "Channels" over on the left.

Having commercials that you can't skip past is a good tip off that
they're legit! ;-)

Joyce

"What you give to your children enriches them. What you withhold from them
impoverishes them."
